alert.note: Alert for Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 27 at 6:18PM EDT until August 27 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL COLUMBUS COUNTY... At 617 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Cherry Grove to Hallsboro, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Tabor City, Chadbourn, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Hallsboro, Cherry Grove, Nakina, Redbug, Old Dock, Mollie, Sidney, Southeastern Community College, Clarendon, Williams, Crusoe Island, Brunswick, Bolton, and Columbus Regional Healthcare System. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
